search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Spotify (spotify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Spotify pricing page can be found at: [https://www.spotify.com/premium/](https://www.spotify.com/premium/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Listen without limits. Try 1 month of Premium Individual for $0.
----------------------------------------------------------------

Only $11.99/month after. Cancel anytime.
----------------------------------------

$0 for 1 month, then $11.99 per month after. Offer only available if you haven't tried Premium before. [Terms apply.](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/paid-subscription-terms/)

Experience the difference
-------------------------

### Go Premium and enjoy full control of your listening. Cancel anytime.

| What you'll get
 | 

Spotify's  
Free plan



 | 

Spotify's  
Premium plans



 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Ad-free music listening

 |  |  |
| Download to listen offline

 |  |  |
| Play songs in any order

 |  |  |
| High audio quality

 |  |  |
| Listen with friends in real time

 |  |  |
| Organize listening queue

 |  |  |

Affordable plans for any situation
----------------------------------

### Choose a Premium plan and listen to ad-free music without limits on your phone, speaker, and other devices. Pay in various ways. Cancel anytime.

*   $0 for 1 month

Premium

### Individual

$0 for 1 month

$11.99 / month after

* * *

*   1 Premium account
    
*   Cancel anytime
    
*   15 hours/month of listening time from our audiobooks subscriber catalog
    

$0 for 1 month, then $11.99 per month after. Offer only available if you haven't tried Premium before. [Terms apply.](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/paid-subscription-terms/)

*   $0 for 1 month

Premium

### Student

$0 for 1 month

$5.99 / month after

* * *

*   1 verified Premium account
    
*   Discount for eligible students
    
*   Access to Hulu
    
*   Cancel anytime
    

$0 for 1 month, then $5.99 per month after. Offer currently includes access to Hulu (With Ads) plan, subject to eligibility. Offer available only to students at an accredited higher education institution and if you haven't tried Premium before. [Terms apply.](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/premium-student-1-month-trial-terms/)

Premium

### Duo

$16.99 / month

* * *

*   2 Premium accounts
    
*   Cancel anytime
    
*   15 hours/month of listening time from our audiobooks subscriber catalog (plan manager only)
    

For couples who reside at the same address. [Terms apply.](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/paid-subscription-terms/)

Premium

### Family

$19.99 / month

* * *

*   Up to 6 Premium or Kids accounts
    
*   Control content marked as explicit
    
*   Access to Spotify Kids
    
*   Cancel anytime
    
*   15 hours/month of listening time from our audiobooks subscriber catalog (plan manager only)
    

For up to 6 family members residing at the same address. [Terms apply.](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/paid-subscription-terms/)

### Audiobooks Access

$9.99 / month

Get 15 hours/month of audiobook listening time from our audiobooks subscriber catalog. Your music listening experience will be on our free, ad-supported service.

Audiobooks Access plan only. [Terms apply](https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/paid-subscription-terms/?ref=premium).

Questions?
----------

We've got answers.

Find more answers in our [support site.](https://support.spotify.com/us/category/plan-help/)

*   How does the Spotify Premium trial work?
    
    If you've never had Premium before, you may be eligible for a free (or reduced rate) trial.
    
    For trials, you'll still need to enter a valid payment method to sign up. We'll use this to confirm your country or region and take payments if you want to keep Premium after the offer ends.
    
    We'll send you a reminder 7 days before your trial ends. Country restrictions and Terms apply.
    
*   How do I cancel my Premium plan?
    
    You can easily cancel your Premium plan any time online on your account page.
    
    Premium paid subscriptions when cancelled, will run until your next billing date, then your account switches over to our free service.
    
    If you cancel during a zero-priced free trial period, you will lose access to your Premium benefits immediately and your account will switch over to our free service. Zero-priced free trials cannot be reactivated.
    
    You'll still keep all your playlists and saved music, and be able to listen with ads on our free service.
    
*   How does the Premium Duo plan work?
    
    Premium Duo is a plan for a couple who lives together. Compared with having two full-price Premium Individual accounts, it's also cheaper. We'll ask for your address to ensure you live at the same address. You can invite a member to the plan right after the purchase. Each member has their own separate Premium account and can listen at the same time with their own account. All saved music and playlists are their own. The other account holder cannot see what you are listening to.
    
    [Read more](https://www.spotify.com/us/duo/) info about Premium Duo.
    
*   How does the Premium Family plan work?
    
    Premium Family is a plan for up to 6 family members who live together. Compared with everyone having their own full-price Premium Individual account, it's also cheaper. We will ask for your address to ensure you live at the same address. You can invite members to the plan right after the purchase. Each member has their own separate Premium account and can listen at the same time with their own account. All saved music and playlists are their own. Other account holders cannot see what you are listening to.
    
    [Read more](https://www.spotify.com/us/family/) info about Premium Family.
    
*   How does the Premium Student Plan work?
    
    If you are a student enrolled at an accredited college or university, and above the age of 18, then yes. You can get Premium Student for up to 4 years. Student plan holders don't have audiobook listening time included in their Premium plan.
    
    [Read more](https://www.spotify.com/us/student/) info about Premium Student.
    
*   How much is Spotify Premium in USA?
    
    The Spotify Premium prices in USA are different depending on which Premium plan you choose: The Spotify Premium Individual plan costs $11.99 per month, the Premium Duo plan costs $16.99 per month, the Premium Family plan costs $19.99 per month, the Premium Student plan costs $5.99 per month. If you've never had a Premium plan before, you may be eligible for a free (or reduced rate) trial. Country restrictions and terms apply.
    
*   How does audiobook listening time work for Premium Individual?
    
    With a Premium Individual plan, you now have access to 15 hours of audiobook listening time per month. Unused listening hours expire at the end of each month and do not carry over. The audiobook subscriber catalog includes over 250,000 titles across many genres and classics. [Learn more.](https://support.spotify.com/us/article/audiobooks-subscriber-catalog/)
    
*   How does audiobook listening time work for Premium Duo and Family?
    
    Only Duo or Family plan managers now have access to 15 hours of audiobook listening time every month from our audiobook subscriber catalog. Unused listening hours expire at the end of each month and do not carry over. Plan members don't have access. [Learn more.](https://support.spotify.com/us/article/audiobooks-subscriber-catalog/)

Spotify Premium is a digital music service that gives you access to ad-free music listening of millions of songs.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Spotify offers a variety of subscription plans tailored to individual, student, duo, and family needs, with a free tier available.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Discounted Premium plan for eligible students.
Premium plan for two users residing at the same address.
features: 15 hours/month of audiobook listening time (plan manager only)

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Premium plan for up to six family members residing at the same address.
features: 15 hours/month of audiobook listening time (plan manager only)

promotional_offers.offer_description: 1 month free trial for new users.
1 month free trial for eligible students.
